com.ccc.deeplearning.da

Class DenoisingAutoEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccc.deeplearning.nn.BaseNeuralNetwork
      • com.ccc.deeplearning.da.DenoisingAutoEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeuralNetwork, Persistable, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class DenoisingAutoEncoder
extends BaseNeuralNetwork
implements Serializable
    Denoising Autoencoder. Add Gaussian noise to input and learn a reconstruction function.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • reconstruct

        public org.jblas.DoubleMatrix reconstruct(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x)
        Description copied from class: BaseNeuralNetwork
        All neural networks are based on this idea of minimizing reconstruction error. Both RBMs and Denoising AutoEncoders have a component for reconstructing, ala different implementations.
        Specified by:
        reconstruct in class BaseNeuralNetwork
        Parameters:
        x - the input to reconstruct
        Returns:
        the reconstructed input
